releases.introduction: This update adds comprehensive Google Gemini API support with full pricing visibility and rate limit notifications, plus significant terminal improvements for shared topics and critical bug fixes for document imports, long conversations, and update detection.

highlights.title: Google Gemini API Integration
highlights.description: Full support for Google Gemini models with automatic metadata discovery, pricing display, and rate limit notifications. Gemini models now show accurate context sizes and costs in the UI.

highlights.title: Terminal Auto-Restart on Directory Change
highlights.description: Terminal now automatically restarts when switching shared topics, ensuring the terminal is always in the correct directory. Running processes are gracefully terminated and the session is recreated with a clean state.

highlights.title: Document Import Path Resolution Fixed
highlights.description: Agents can now correctly import documents using relative paths like 'book/file.md' without encountering authorization errors. Paths are properly resolved against the workspace directory.

improvements.title: Terminal Session Recovery
improvements.description: Terminal now detects when shell processes exit (e.g., after 'exit' or 'logout') and automatically restarts the session when Reset is clicked, eliminating 'errno 5' errors.

improvements.title: Gemini Cost Visibility
improvements.description: All Gemini models now display pricing information ($X/$Y/1M format) with helpful tooltips explaining input/output costs per million tokens.

improvements.title: Rate Limit Notifications
improvements.description: When Gemini rate limits are hit, SAM now shows an alert with the retry countdown instead of silently waiting.

improvements.title: Smart Model Filtering
improvements.description: Image and video generation models (Imagen, Veo) are automatically filtered from the chat picker. These will be integrated with Stable Diffusion UI in future updates.

improvements.title: Improved Workspace File Access
improvements.description: Document import operations now use consistent path resolution, ensuring agents have seamless access to files within their designated workspace.

releases.introduction: This update fixes critical issues affecting long conversations and the automatic update system. SAM now properly handles conversations with hundreds of messages and won't incorrectly suggest updates when you're already on the latest version.

highlights.title: Long Conversation Support Fixed
highlights.description: Resolved token limit errors in extended conversations. YARN compression now properly reduces message sizes by 60-70%, allowing conversations to continue without interruption.

highlights.title: Improved Token Estimation
highlights.description: Token counts now use the actual tokenizer instead of character-based approximations, providing estimates accurate to within 5-10% of model limits.

highlights.title: Update Detection Corrected
highlights.description: Fixed an issue where the update checker would prompt for updates even when already on the current version.

improvements.title: Model Limit Compliance
improvements.description: Requests to GitHub Copilot and other providers now respect model context limits, with automatic conversation compression when needed.

releases.introduction: This update brings major improvements to CivitAI model browsing with smarter caching, multi-page loading, and fixed API authentication. Browse thousands of Stable Diffusion models efficiently without hammering the API.

highlights.title: Smart Model Catalog Caching
highlights.description: Model catalogs now cache locally for 24 hours. Instant loading on subsequent visits, drastically reduced API requests, and better overall performance.

highlights.title: Multi-Page Model Loading
highlights.description: Automatically loads up to 1,000 checkpoint models across 10 pages. No more seeing just the first 100 - explore the full catalog.

highlights.title: Fixed CivitAI Authentication
highlights.description: API authentication now uses proper query parameters. Eliminates rate limiting issues and ensures reliable model browsing with your API key.

improvements.title: Cursor-Based Pagination
improvements.description: Reliable pagination using CivitAI's cursor system. No more failures beyond page 20 - navigate through thousands of models smoothly.

improvements.title: Manual Cache Refresh
improvements.description: New Refresh button clears cache and reloads from API. Get the latest models on demand while benefiting from caching most of the time.

improvements.title: Swift 6 Concurrency
improvements.description: Full Sendable conformance for thread-safe model data. Actor-isolated caching prevents data races and ensures reliable operation.

releases.introduction: Welcome to SAM - Synthetic Autonomic Mind! SAM is a native macOS AI assistant built to work *with* you, not just *for* you. Designed for privacy, SAM keeps your conversations and data on your Mac while giving you access to powerful AI capabilities: multi-provider support, voice interaction, local image generation, document analysis, and intelligent tools. Say "Hey SAM" to go hands-free, or type naturally - you're always in control.

highlights.title: Native macOS Experience
highlights.description: Beautiful SwiftUI interface designed specifically for Mac. Fast, responsive, and follows macOS design guidelines perfectly.

highlights.title: Privacy You Can Trust
highlights.description: All conversations and data stay on your Mac. Works with local AI models by default. Cloud AI providers only when you choose.

highlights.title: Full Voice Control
highlights.description: Say "Hey SAM" for hands-free operation. Complete voice input and natural text-to-speech output. Works offline with local models.

highlights.title: Multi-Provider AI Support
highlights.description: Choose from OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, DeepSeek, GitHub Copilot, or run models locally with MLX and GGUF. Switch providers anytime.

highlights.title: Local Image Generation
highlights.description: Create beautiful images with Stable Diffusion running entirely on your Mac. No subscriptions, no cloud uploads, just your imagination.

highlights.title: 14 Integrated Tools
highlights.description: File management, web research with citations, image generation, document analysis, shell commands, and more. Real work, not just conversation.

highlights.title: Document Analysis
highlights.description: Upload PDFs, Word docs, text files, and more. Ask questions, get summaries, extract insights. Your documents become searchable knowledge.

highlights.title: Smart Memory System
highlights.description: Create Shared Topics to connect conversations around projects. Find anything by meaning with semantic search, not just keywords.

improvements.title: 24 Personalities
improvements.description: From friendly and professional to creative and technical. Choose the tone that fits your task, or create custom personalities.

improvements.title: Project Organization
improvements.description: Keep everything organized in ~/SAM/{project-name}/ folders. Generated images, downloads, and outputs automatically organized.

improvements.title: Automatic Updates
improvements.description: Integrated Sparkle framework for seamless updates. Check for Updates menu keeps SAM current with the latest features and fixes.
